Operation.xpath: /Defs/HediffDef[@ParentName="addedPartSimple"] [defName="ArtificialHumerus" or defName="ArtificialRadius" or defName="ArtificialTibia" or defName="ArtificialFemur" or defName="ArtificialClavicle" or defName="ArtificialRibcage" or defName="ArtificialSternum" or defName="SpinalFusion"]
/Defs/HediffDef[@ParentName="addedPartSimple"] [defName="SimpleProstheticArm" or defName="SimpleProstheticHand" or defName="SimpleProstheticLeg" or defName="SimpleProstheticFoot"]
/Defs/ThingDef[@ParentName="Simple"] [defName="SimpleProstheticArm" or defName="SimpleProstheticHand" or defName="SimpleProstheticLeg" or defName="SimpleProstheticFoot"]

/Defs/RecipeDef[@ParentName="SurgerySimple"] [defName="InstallSimpleProstheticArm" or defName="InstallSimpleProstheticHand" or defName="InstallSimpleProstheticLeg" or defName="InstallSimpleProstheticFoot"]
/Defs/RecipeDef [defName="MakeSimpleProstheticArm" or defName="MakeSimpleProstheticHand" or defName="MakeSimpleProstheticLeg" or defName="MakeSimpleProstheticFoot" or defName="MakeArtificialBone"]

/Defs/ThingDef[defName="TableMachining"]/recipes/li [text()="MakeSimpleProstheticArm" or text()="MakeSimpleProstheticHand" or text()="MakeSimpleProstheticLeg" or text()="MakeSimpleProstheticFoot" or text()="MakeArtificialBone"]
/Defs/HediffDef[@ParentName="addedPartBionics"] [defName="PowerArm" or defName="BionicArm" or defName="BionicHand" or defName="BionicLeg" or defName="BionicFoot"]
/Defs/ThingDef[@ParentName="Bionic"] [defName="PowerArm" or defName="BionicArm" or defName="BionicHand" or defName="BionicLeg" or defName="BionicFoot"]
/Defs/RecipeDef[@ParentName="SurgeryBionic"] [defName="InstallPowerArm" or defName="InstallBionicArm" or defName="InstallBionicHand" or defName="InstallBionicLeg" or defName="InstallBionicFoot"]
/Defs/RecipeDef [defName="MakePowerArm" or defName="MakeBionicArm" or defName="MakeBionicHand" or defName="MakeBionicLeg" or defName="MakeBionicFoot" or defName="MakePowerClaw"]

/Defs/ThingDef[defName="BionicWorkbench"]/recipes/li [text()="MakePowerArm" or text()="MakeBionicArm" or text()="MakeBionicHand" or text()="MakeBionicLeg" or text()="MakeBionicFoot" or text()="MakePowerClaw"]

/Defs/HediffDef[@ParentName="addedPartAdvanced"] [defName="AdvancedPowerArm" or defName="AdvancedBionicArm" or defName="AdvancedBionicHand" or defName="AdvancedBionicLeg" or defName="AdvancedBionicFoot" or defName="ArchotechArm" or defName="ArchotechLeg"]
/Defs/ThingDef[@ParentName="Advanced"] [defName="AdvancedPowerArm" or defName="AdvancedBionicArm" or defName="AdvancedBionicHand" or defName="AdvancedBionicLeg" or defName="AdvancedBionicFoot"]

/Defs/RecipeDef[@ParentName="SurgeryAdvanced"] [defName="InstallAdvancedPowerArm" or defName="InstallAdvancedBionicArm" or defName="InstallAdvancedBionicHand" or defName="InstallAdvancedBionicLeg" or defName="InstallAdvancedBionicFoot"]
/Defs/RecipeDef [defName="MakeAdvancedPowerArm" or defName="MakeAdvancedBionicArm" or defName="MakeAdvancedBionicHand" or defName="MakeAdvancedBionicLeg" or defName="MakeAdvancedBionicFoot"]

/Defs/ThingDef[defName="AdvancedMedicalStation"]/recipes/li [text()="MakeAdvancedPowerArm" or text()="MakeAdvancedBionicArm" or text()="MakeAdvancedBionicHand" or text()="MakeAdvancedBionicLeg" or text()="MakeAdvancedBionicFoot"]
